column1: Please do not remove rows/fields from this form. Simply change the dropdown menus in columnss D, E, F, and G.
If a change is made, the field should automatically BOLD itself the value that was changed so our team can know what you have changed. If it doesn not do so automatically, please bold the cell.
If you would like to relabel the field, please provide the changed value in column H
If you need clarification on what a field is or have a comment for that field, please enter that comment in column J
If new fields/dropdowns are needed, please add those to the "Create New Fields" tab and any dropdown values to a new column in the Dropdown Values tab
If "Remove/Hide" is selected in Column E, please also select "Remove/Hide" for Available at Request Creation (Column F) and Visible to Loan Officers (Column G)
To view the values in the dropdown values, click the arrow in the "see values" cells to see the fields. Please follow instructions on "Dropdown Values" sheet to add/remove values.
